Core:PCProperties.Core:Property: "Emit a string into your environment. The '+'-character is used to substitute person names. Note that the +\-feature only works on characters without titles."

"+emit A pink panda snarls at +Kalle deviously.\\r\\n Emit the message into the user's environment. Everyone except Kalle receives \\"A pink panda snarls at Kalle deviously.\\" Kalle receives \\"A pink panda snarls at you deviously.\\""
